item.description:
I have not held any events for this Meetup in a while so I thought I would cross post this event that I will also run for the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Meetup. I will be hosting the event in Union Square so that should be very convenient for those of us that live in Somerville.
-------
Who doesn't like a good happy hour on a Thirsty Thursday? Come by Cantina La Mexicana, 247 Washington St., between 6pm and 8pm for a family style Mexican dinner including - tamales, quesadillas and burros (oh my!). Let's not forget some tasty sangria! For just $11 you can taste some Mexican favorites and a bit of sangria, AND you can learn more about the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club.

If you do not want the food then just come by after 8pm and hang out. No cost (but no food) after 8pm. We will stay at Cantina until at least 9pm and then may hit a couple of the local bars. Union Square is best known for the "The Independent" and "The Precinct" bars.

http://www.lataqueria....
item.how_to_find_us: Should be easy - we will take over have the restaurant.
item.name: Get to know us Dinner
